Articles.Content:
I KNEW i've seen him around before!

(Well, probably you all already knew...)
And here's the real deal, not Ed Harris from Apollo 13:
Are we gonna start posting pics of Von Braun and Von Kerman, too?

Yeah, it's a nice little nod to Gene Kranz

As LethalDose pointed out, Von Kerman is a nod to Von Braun, too!

And here's the real deal, not Ed Harris from Apollo 13:

http://i.imgur.com/0fCCzXM.jpg

To be frank, the two do look awfully similar. Hell they even have slightly similar voices.

And I'd say its more than a nod, considering Gene Kerman even has Kranz's signature vest on.
Hell no, Von Kerman doesn't even remotely look like Wehrner....

Hell no, Von Kerman doesn't even remotely look like Wehrner....

And we can all be a little more comfortable with Von Kerman's past than Von Braun's.

Hell no, Von Kerman doesn't even remotely look like Wehrner....

Man, truth. I think they could have pulled it off if they gave him the rocking beard he had in this photo. You know who does look like him, though, with that beard? Christoph Waltz with his Django beard.

And we can all be a little more comfortable with Von Kerman's past than Von Braun's.

/sigh. Great, now the topic of the National Socialist German Workers' Party has been brought up... guess it's time for the thread to get locked...
Isn't there an Internet "rule" that a thread is over once someone mentions n*z*s?

Isn't there an Internet "rule" that a thread is over once someone mentions n*z*s?

I think the rule is that you're never more than 6 connections away from it. But do stay away from that kind of topic, or this thread will quickly be sporting a shiny grey padlock icon which, while stylish, also disables the 'reply' button.

Cheers
Oh man, I knew I've seen him before, just wasn't sure where

I think the rule is that you're never more than 6 connections away from it.

That theory is that you're never more than 6 degrees separated from anything, not just... those guys.

But do stay away from that kind of topic, or this thread will quickly be sporting a shiny grey padlock icon which, while stylish, also disables the 'reply' button.

Cheers

So just remember, between prior to being recruited by the US, Von Braun, like all the other Germans from 1935-45, were on vacation!

Edited July 18, 2014 by LethalDose

And here's the real deal, not Ed Harris from Apollo 13:

http://i.imgur.com/0fCCzXM.jpg

He even has some snacks!

If Squad wanted to add extra confusion, they could add a character based on "Last Man On The Moon" Gene Cernan, commander of Apollo 17. Then we would have Gene Kerman and Gene...Oh, wait?! Then they could take things a step further and add a character based on Harrison "Jack" Schmitt to advise us on Mun surface samples!

I think the rule is that you're never more than 6 connections away from it. But do stay away from that kind of topic, or this thread will quickly be sporting a shiny grey padlock icon which, while stylish, also disables the 'reply' button.

Cheers

Wow! The "Man" himself steps in to comment! I've lurked the forums for some time now and don't ever recall seeing him respond to a thread. What did you do Harv, fire all the moderators? (Just kidding, We all love you) Heil HarvesteR! oops!

Isn't there an Internet "rule" that a thread is over once someone mentions n*z*s?

Godwin's Law

Don't call him hypocritical. Just say he's apolitical.

n*zi-schmazi, says Wehrner von Braun...

Steering away from that line of discussion, there's quite a few "reference" names in the lineup. Scott (Scott Manley), Buzz (Buzz Aldrin), and Kirk (Captain Kirk from Star Trek) to name a few.

Godwin's Law

Don't call him hypocritical. Just say he's apolitical.

n*zi-schmazi, says Wehrner von Braun...

Steering away from that line of discussion, there's quite a few "reference" names in the lineup. Scott (Scott Manley), Buzz (Buzz Aldrin), and Kirk (Captain Kirk from Star Trek) to name a few.

I flew a ship one time with Scott, Buzz, and one of the other "specially" named kerbals, all happily in a 3 man pod

I have never had such a disastrous and catastrophic ending to a mission, ever. I probably have screenshots around here somewhere...

Wow! The "Man" himself steps in to comment! I've lurked the forums for some time now and don't ever recall seeing him respond to a thread. What did you do Harv, fire all the moderators? (Just kidding, We all love you) Heil HarvesteR! oops!

That's in very bad taste. Beyond being offensive, it's how threads get locked.
I hate the internet sometimes, you know that?
Don't hate the internet, hate meatbags spoiling this wonderful invention
The first thing I noticed about Gene Kerman is that he sounds almost exactly like a Minecraft villager.

The first thing I noticed about Gene Kerman is that he sounds almost exactly like a Minecraft villager.

Oh wow, he really does...
I think it more likely that Scott Kerman is a nod to Scott Carpenter (of the Mercury Program), but I suppose it's possible!
Wearing the Crisis Vest. Mr. Fat Face.

Wearing the Crisis Vest. Mr. Fat Face.

http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110404014234/archer/images/3/35/RayinCrisisVest.png

ISIS?

*ominous music*
